hero.title: Plans and Prices
hero.subtitle1: Here, you'll find a clear breakdown of our service plans and their respective features. Whether you're a small business or a large enterprise, we have options tailored to your needs.
hero.subtitle2: You can choose the plan that best suits your goals!

hero.title: Connecting Contractors and Workforce, Seamlessly
hero.subtitle: Find skilled workers fast - connect with HR companies or contractors through one smart platform.

items.title: Create Your Profile
items.description: Sign up and create a your profile.

items.title: Find Your Match
items.description: Our smart platform connects you with the right opportunities.

items.title: Get to Work
items.description: Once connected, you can schedule, manage, and track your work all in one place. It's that simple.

items.title: What is WorkClick?
items.description: WorkClick is a platform that connects contractors and workers in the construction industry. We help contractors find skilled workers and help workers find jobs.

items.title: How do I get started?
items.description: To get started, simply sign up and create your profile. If you are a contractor, you can post your job openings. If you are a worker, you can browse for available jobs.
